name: Konec stalinismu v Cechách
summary: A bust of Stalin is cut open on an operating table, leading to an elaborate animated depiction of Czech history from 1948 (the Communist takeover) to 1989 (the Velvet Revolution). Some knowledge of the subject is essential in order to understand the film, which is entirely visual.
info:
• 中文名: 斯大林主义在波西米亚的终结
  • 话数: 1
  • 导演: Jan Švankmajer
  • 别名: The Death of Stalinism in Bohemia
  • 上映年度: 1991-02-13
  • 片长: 10分钟
  • 类型: 动画 / 短片
  • 制片国家/地区: 捷克
